originalText.text: I have been waiting for Dr. Donnelleyâ€™s practice to open after great experiences having her as my dermatologist previously. The new practice is beautiful and the care is exemplary. Appointments are not rushed, we had the time to talk through all of my skin concerns, do a full skin cancer screening, and a procedure all in one appointment. I also really appreciate the transparent pricing model of the practice, all medical care should be delivered this way.

originalText.text: I did a thing today you guys! I finally had my first Dermatology visit! Dr. Donnelley was kind, patient, gentle and very informative, thorough and considerate to me. She made my experience pretty calm, cool and comfortable for me. I really appreciate that. I highly recommend her for all skin care needs; medical, cosmetic and surgical as well. She's excellent and worth it. It was a pleasant first time experience for me. Thank you, Dr. Donnelley. You're awesome! ðŸ˜Š

originalText.text: Dr. Donnelley is the best dermatologist Iâ€™ve ever had. originalText.text: From the moment I walked in, the entire experience at Donnelley Dermatology was amazing.  The staff was friendly and the office is absolutely beautiful.  Dr. Donnelley was not only knowledgeable, but also took the time to address all my questions. I left feeling confident in the laser treatment I received and am looking forward to my next visit!

originalText.text: Dr. Donnelley is kind, thorough, relatable and can assist with all services from annual skin cancer screenings to more cosmetic support. I followed her from her former practice.
